page.title: 07Games we play at school.
page.content: Most schools have three playtimes, in which you can go outside and play games like marbles, sausages, elastics,etc. Our class mostly plays sausages and the boys always chase the girls.There are two more games, but we do not play with the boys.They are elastics for the girls and football for the boys.We play elastics by tying a piece of elastic together then jumping over it.We have a rymne to go with our jumping, we say England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales, inside, outside, inside, scales.
